PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13272022-12-15,  ,  ,  ,  PCH, 
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectOrder Approving a Lease Agreement between the Ville de Montréal and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
PrecisOrder approving that the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION enter into a lease agreement with the Ville de Montréal for the use or occupation of real property of approximately 15,000 square feet located in Parc du Mont-Royal in Montréal, Quebec, for a term of 10 years beginning on January 1, 2023, with the option to renew the lease for two further periods of five years each, for a total expenditure in excess of fifteen million dollars.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Approving a Lease Agreement between the Ville de Montréal and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
precis: Order approving that the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION enter into a lease agreement with the Ville de Montréal for the use or occupation of real property of approximately 15,000 square feet located in Parc du Mont-Royal in Montréal, Quebec, for a term of 10 years beginning on January 1, 2023, with the option to renew the lease for two further periods of five years each, for a total expenditure in excess of fifteen million dollars.
